00033 using namespace std;
00034 using namespace affx;
00035 
00036 MetaProbeset::MetaProbeset() {
00037   name = NULL;
00038   displayName = NULL;
00039   freeSubs = true;
00040 }
00041 
00042 MetaProbeset::~MetaProbeset() {
00043   if(freeSubs) {
00044     delete [] name;
00045     for(uint32_t i = 0; i < probesets.size(); i++) {
00046       delete [] probesets[i];
00047     }
00048   }
00049 }
00050 
00051 void MetaProbeset::readProbesetSubset(TsvFile &tsv, vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaSets) {
00052     string probeset;
00053     tsv.bind(0, "probeset_id", &probeset, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00054     set<string> seen;
00055     while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK) {
00056         if(seen.find(probeset) != seen.end())
00057             Err::errAbort("Probeset '" + probeset + "' already seen in file: " + tsv.getFileName());
00058         else 
00059             seen.insert(probeset);
00060         MetaProbeset *set = new MetaProbeset();
00061         set->name = Util::cloneString(probeset.c_str());
00062         set->probesets.resize(1);
00063         set->probesets[0] = Util::cloneString(probeset.c_str());
00064         metaSets.push_back(set);
00065     }
00066 }
00067 
00068 void MetaProbeset::readMetaProbesetList(TsvFile &tsv, vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaSets) {
00069     string probeset, probesetList;
00070     vector<string> words;
00071 
00072     tsv.bind(0, "probeset_id", &probeset, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00073     // list of probesets can be either called probeset_list or 
00074     if(tsv.cname2cidx(0, "probeset_list") != TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND)
00075         tsv.bind(0, "probeset_list", &probesetList, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00076     else if(tsv.cname2cidx(0, "probeset_ids") != TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND)
00077         tsv.bind(0, "probeset_ids", &probesetList, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00078     else
00079         Err::errAbort("Meta probeset list must contain 'probeset_list'");
00080 
00081     set<string> seen;
00082     while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK) {
00083         if(seen.find(probeset) != seen.end())
00084             Err::errAbort("Probeset identifier: '" + probeset + "' already seen in file: " + tsv.getFileName());
00085         else 
00086             seen.insert(probeset);
00087         MetaProbeset *set = new MetaProbeset();
00088         size_t minSize = 0;
00089         set->name = Util::cloneString(probeset.c_str());
00090         Util::chopString(probesetList, ' ', words);
00091         if(words.empty()) 
00092             Err::errAbort("Didn't get a list of sub-probesets for meta probeset '" + probeset + "'");
00093         minSize = words[0].size();
00094         /* Sanity check to make sure we got real ids and not ,,, */
00095         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00096             minSize = min(words[i].length(), minSize);
00097         }        
00098         if(minSize == 0) 
00099             Err::errAbort("At line: " + ToStr(tsv.lineNumber()) + " got empty id in '" + probeset + "'");
00100         set->probesets.resize(words.size(), NULL);
00101         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00102             set->probesets[i] = Util::cloneString(words[i].c_str());
00103         }
00104         metaSets.push_back(set);
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 void MetaProbeset::readMetaProbesets(const string fileName, const bool metaFile, vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaSets) {
00110     metaSets.clear();
00111     TsvFile tsv;
00112     // open file and make sure that it has at least a probeset_id column
00113     if(tsv.open(fileName) != TSV_OK) 
00114         Err::errAbort("Couldn't open file: '" + ToStr(fileName) + "'");
00115     Verbose::out(2, "Opening file: " + ToStr(fileName) + " to read.");
00116     if(tsv.cname2cidx(0, "probeset_id") == TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND) {
00117         Err::errAbort("File: " + ToStr(fileName) + " must have column named 'probeset_id'. Is this the right file?");
00118     }
00119 
00120     // if file has additional probeset_list column (or deprcated
00121     // probeset_ids) then it is a meta probesets file, else it is a
00122     // subset file.
00123     if((tsv.cname2cidx(0, "probeset_list") != TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND) ||
00124         (tsv.cname2cidx(0, "probeset_ids") != TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND)) {
00125         if(metaFile == false) {
00126         Err::errAbort("File: '" + fileName + 
00127                     "' has both probeset_ids and probeset_list columns - should you be using meta-probesets option?");
00128         }
00129         readMetaProbesetList(tsv, metaSets);
00130     }
00131     else {
00132         readProbesetSubset(tsv, metaSets);
00133     }
00134     Verbose::out(2, "Read " + ToStr(metaSets.size()) + " probesets.");
00135     tsv.close();
00136 }
